projects.title: Atos Game Team
projects.description: Together with Erik Kuiper, I'm the driving force behind the 'Atos Game Team'. This team is set up to promote (Serious) games, gamification and game psychology within and outside Atos. I am responsible for setting up gamification and gamepsychology courses, giving presentations, leading workshops on gamification and writing (scientific) papers.

profile_positions.description:
Vendor and Contract Manager ICT in Healthcare insurance. Part of Vendor, Continuity and Performance Management.

Financial Management
Vendor Management (internal control, and control based on external supervisors)
Contract Management
Tendering
profile_positions.title: Vendor Manager

profile_positions.description: After receiving my masters degree, research played yet another important role in my life. This is also a great passion of mine. In 2012 I started my PhD research where I take the perspective on how gaming can be used within organizations to facilitate a sustainable behavior change. I mainly focus on changing people and organizations through a mixture of (social) psychology and 'hard' science.
profile_positions.title: PhD candidate (Part-time PhD Student) Motivational Design and Behavior Change

profile_positions.description:
As Operational Director @ Atos AIR I’m responsible for operations, P&L and overall strategy and vision of our Augmented & Mixed Reality organization. 

Responsible for:
- Operations
- Vendor management
- Contract management
- HR
- Delivery
- p&l
- Innovation
- Conceptual
- Commercial
- Financial

Together with Erik Kuiper (Creative Director) & Wim Ederveen (Technical Director) we run the Augmented Interactive Reality organization within Atos.

For more information about AIR: https://atos.net/content/mini-sites/journey-2020/pages/ways-of-working/index5ee3.html?techno=air
profile_positions.title: Operational Director Augmented Interactive Reality (AIR) Organization (@Atos)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the expert path of 200+ Experts globally and leading and managing 50+ experts in a subdomain on Design.

Within Atos one of my core focus areas is about the use of psychology within the design of innovation. 

Due to my extended work on Persuasive and Motivational Design within Innovation such as VR/AR/MR and gaming, Atos identified me as a Distinguished Expert in May 2017. This enables me to drive forwards both the internal and external discussions around these topics. 

A Distinguished Expert at Atos:
- Masters a portfolio of solutions or technologies within the group.
- Represents the Group in symposiums and conferences, is strongly involved with key clients opportunities and projects.
- Is responsible for the creation and coordination of expert networks and communities in his/her domain of expertise and develops experts and senior experts within Atos.
profile_positions.title: Distinguished Expert Persuasive and Motivational Design (Subdomain/unit managent Solutions Design)

profile_positions.description: By allowing Atos to anticipate and craft its vision facing the upcoming technology disruptions and the new challenges of our industry, the Scientific Community will play a key role in repositioning our Group as a world leader of the IT Services industry with a reputation as an innovator and thought-leader.
profile_positions.title: Member Scientific Community

profile_positions.description: Within Atos BTN I am the consulting lead for everything with 'Gamification and eXtended Realities (AR/VR/MR)'. Within BTN (Benelux and the Nordics), I'm responsible for everything which has to do with Gamification, Games, Virtual Reality and Gamepsychology. I am the founder of two different courses in the field of Gamification, "Foudation Course '&' Advanced Course '. Both courses are accredited as a post-graduate training through the University of Applied Sciences of Arnhem and Nijmegen (HAN). These courses are given both internally at Atos and to external people (this is done in collaboration with the HAN).
profile_positions.title: GBU Consulting Lead Gamification/eXtended Reality Benelux and the Nordics

profile_positions.description:
I'm the driving force behind the gamification branch of Atos. Here I examine how we can implement gamification, games and gamepsychology within organizations. Researching, shaping ideas on gamification solutions and applying game and psychological aspects are some of my qualities.

Besides gamification solutions within Atos, I also give gamification advice to various other customers of Atos. I also give several presentations to create awareness on the term 'gamification' and associated game psychology and why companies should be interested in this topic. I focus mainly on behavior, change and motivation.
profile_positions.title: Gamification, Gamepsychology & Change specialist

profile_positions.description: After my academic study I joined Atos as a business / information analyst. Soon I specialized in the area of business processes and change management and done a number of successfull projects. After starting my PhD research, I am now specialized in the area of games and gamification and the motivating force behind this.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Within Atos Consulting I work with the e-Suite, a case management system, by Atos. Our focus is on the central Government.
Tasks involve: Training, Change management, Developing new ways of working and thinking and implementation
profile_positions.title: Implementation and Change Consultant E-Suite

profile_positions.description: Within Ziggo I am responsible for conceiving and directing the development (which is done by an external company) of a gamified learning environment for the customer contact agents of Ziggo. I also do the required research in the field of eg. game psychology, to form a proper basis from which a desgin can be made.
profile_positions.title: Gamified Learning Specialist (via Atos)

profile_positions.description: Within the HAN I am responsible for designing the Game Design Theory part within the Serious Game (SEGA) module. This module is part of the Communication & Multimedia Design course of the ICA (Information & Communication Academy).
profile_positions.title: SEGA (Serious Games + Gamification) course designer (via Atos)

profile_positions.description: Within VIR I was responsible for setting up the entire Product Management process. Besides consulting on how this process could be arranged, I also designed these processes and eventually transferred them to VIR.
profile_positions.title: Proces and Change Consultant (via Atos)

profile_positions.description: As part of my research I try to do as much case studies (to test my theoretical knowledge about gamification and game psychology in practice) as possible. At the Dutch Tax Office I have researched to what extend gamification can be used to encouraging the use of online communities and knowledge sharing. In addition to giving advice on a possible gamification solution, scientific research and support was an important part of this project. I will also publish a journal article from this case study in the context of my PhD research.
profile_positions.title: Gamification (& gamepsychology) consultant / researcher (via Atos and Radboud University)

profile_positions.company: Ministerie van Volksgezondheid, Welzijn en Sport
profile_positions.description: Give advice. Something I really like to do. During this project, I have given advice on ​​solutions for changes and defects for future deliveries of the Regulhulp.nl application. I have done research for optimization of the application itself and how changes and defects could be solved. I gave this advice to the management team.
profile_positions.title: Consultant (via Atos)

profile_positions.description:
In mid-2011, APG Group and ABN AMRO Bank, established a joint venture and started a premium pension institution (PPI) . From this joint venture, the question came to Be Informed to create an application to support this PPI.

The application, as it is offered by Be Informed, is a hybrid solution of both case management and knowledge solutions. As part of this assignment I was involved as a designer and modeler in both case and knowledge management.
profile_positions.title: Case management and knowledge modeler (via Atos)
